price: 2. Allahai! La ilaha illa Huva (niekas neturi teisės būti garbinamas, tik Jis), Al-Haijul-Kaijūm (Amžinas, Tas, Kuris išlaiko ir saugo visa, kas egzistuoja).
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
